forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 24C. E winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 75F. E winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear this evening then becoming mostly cloudy after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. NNE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. NNE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
